Link 链接 ​

文字超链接

基础用法 ​

基础的文字链接用法

defaultprimarysuccesswarningdangerinfo
<template>
  <div>
    <dora-link href="https://doraement-plus.org" target="_blank">default</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="primary">primary</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="success">success</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="warning">warning</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="danger">danger</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="info">info</dora-link>
  </div>
</template>

禁用状态 ​

文字链接不可用状态

defaultprimarysuccesswarningdangerinfo
<template>
  <div>
    <dora-link disabled>default</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="primary" disabled>primary</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="success" disabled>success</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="warning" disabled>warning</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="danger" disabled>danger</dora-link>
    <dora-link type="info" disabled>info</dora-link>
  </div>
</template>

下划线 ​

文字链接下划线

Without UnderlineWith Underline
<template>
  <div>
    <dora-link :underline="false">Without Underline</dora-link>
    <dora-link>With Underline</dora-link>
  </div>
</template>
